framework.name: Bushido
framework.description: Opinionated, modular PHP framework encapsulating best practices, composable patterns, and enterprise-grade features.

principles.name: Composability
principles.description: Assemble complex systems from simple, predictable building blocks.

principles.name: EventDriven
principles.description: Synchronous and asynchronous flows as first-class citizens for resilient architectures.

principles.name: Observability
principles.description: Logging, metrics, and tracing built-in for operational insight.

principles.name: Security
principles.description: Zero-trust defaults, signed messages, and idempotent operations.

principles.name: Discipline
principles.description: Opinionated conventions, patterns, and standards for consistent codebases.

principles.name: Scalability
principles.description: Support for growth, distributed workloads, and high performance.

principles.name: Extensibility
principles.description: Plug-in modules, adapters, and integrations for evolving business requirements.

principles.name: Resilience
principles.description: Automated retries, failure compensation, and fault-tolerant orchestration.

runtimes.name: Web
runtimes.description: Standard PHP web runtime supporting FastRoute, HTTP request/response handling.

runtimes.name: CLI
runtimes.description: Command-line runtime powered by Symfony Console.

runtimes.name: Swoole
runtimes.description: Asynchronous runtime supporting high concurrency and long-running processes.

modules.discovery: Reflection and attribute-based auto-discovery of components, commands, events, queries, routes.
modules.commands: CLI commands and custom application commands.
modules.events: Event-driven architecture support for publish/subscribe patterns.
modules.queues: Task queues with retries and outbox pattern.
modules.dto: Immutable data transfer objects for message passing and system boundaries.
modules.logging: Structured logging with optional telemetry integration.
modules.filesystem: Abstraction over local and remote storage.
modules.database: ORM or repository patterns, transactional integrity, PostgreSQL backed CSR/Cognition substrate.
modules.security: Zero-trust defaults, message signing, identity verification.
modules.ui: Composable front-end components for Astro/Alpine.js, templating for web apps.

platform.name: Shinobi
platform.description: Composable business capability server for enterprise applications, providing federated nodes, context repository, and message moderation.
capabilities: Federated service nodes with dynamic component registration
Context repository maintaining semantic state and system behavior
Message moderator handling sync, async, and event-based communication
Traceability, visibility, retries, and failure compensation
Versioned bindable components for modular business logic
interop: OpenSwoole for concurrency and async task workers
platform.outbox: Message reliability pattern with retry, circuit breakers, and idempotency.

documentation.readme: Provides installation, configuration, guides, and tutorials for Bushido and Shinobi.
